full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
Spare Parts and Trailers - Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Reference Number
cb-539-85094450

## Solicitation Number
W8486-249359/A

## Publication Date
2023-11-14

## Tender Closing Date
2024-02-29T14:00:00

## Amendment Number
9

## Amendment Date
2024-02-29

## Expected Contract Start Date
2024-04-01

## Expected Contract End Date
2024-07-31

## Tender Status
Expired

## Notice Type
Request for Proposal

## Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

## Selection Criteria
Lowest Price

## Contracting Entity Name
Department of National Defence

## Contracting Entity Address
101 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, Ontario
K1A 0K2

## Notice URL
None

## Attachment
[Documentation 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24785/w8486-249359---smp---spares---trailer-parts---rfp-english---amdt-001.pdf)
[Documentation 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24785/w8486-249359---smp---spares---trailer---parts---rfp---english.pdf)

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for spare parts and trailers as detailed below. The procurement is subject to the rules and regulations set forth in the solicitation document.

## Requirements
A total of 40 items have been identified for procurement, as follows:

- **Item 1**: Cable, Power, Electrical, Part No.: A13365
- **Item 2**: Cable, Power, Electrical, Part No.: A13365
- ...
- **Item 40**: Grease Guard, Back, Part No.: 8477191-1

Each item has specific quantities and delivery locations as specified in the solicitation document.

## Submission Requirements
Bidders are required to submit their proposals electronically via e-mail to [DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca](mailto:DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca).

Bidders are also required to sign and return a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA)
